comment: Copy this to config.local.json and update with your values from AWSNodeRunner deployment

instructions.getBootNodes: aws ssm send-command --instance-ids $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name near-localnet-infrastructure --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`nearinstanceid`].OutputValue' --output text) --document-name AWS-RunShellScript --parameters 'commands=["curl -s http://localhost:3030/status | jq -r .node_key"]'
